mk-JOztMyzZ6-dKO4.name: Directional
mk-JOztMyzZ6-dKO4.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

mEhE734CwO9oxsXV8.name: Tough Skin
mEhE734CwO9oxsXV8.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

mRh2fY_1yeqxtc0rQ.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

mCQcV5PfRtW_En1yE.name: Diffuse
mCQcV5PfRtW_En1yE.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

meGuLb5NND7b4u8L2.name: Homogenous
meGuLb5NND7b4u8L2.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mhxVNUs1np_9cFzZ6.name: No Blood
mhxVNUs1np_9cFzZ6.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mxTZdVYGykbEZHzNo.name: No Brain
mxTZdVYGykbEZHzNo.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mq72J3FYxLlEWtB50.name: No Eyes
mq72J3FYxLlEWtB50.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

m28uEf5a8o9ZAB6Xc.name: No Head
m28uEf5a8o9ZAB6Xc.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mH-66rmS2j9FCwgXf.name: No Neck
mH-66rmS2j9FCwgXf.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mmaqiNzA8low3_b27.name: No Vitals
mmaqiNzA8low3_b27.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

m2eiub91TrJB1ojEi.name: Unliving
m2eiub91TrJB1ojEi.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

mYJchUnROugZuniHg.name: Oxygen Storage
mYJchUnROugZuniHg.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

mOdE2oOBND_H0UfjE.name: Oxygen Storage
mOdE2oOBND_H0UfjE.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

m0iRh4EQUPwEKhXpj.name: Oxygen Storage
m0iRh4EQUPwEKhXpj.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

mK6VHdxmZzmloJWJw.name: Oxygen Storage
mK6VHdxmZzmloJWJw.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

mnjU6EAa1wL3-n7p7.name: Oxygen Storage
mnjU6EAa1wL3-n7p7.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal
